name: 拉丽莎
actor: 拉莉萨·舍皮琴科 Larisa Shepitko
summary: A loving film tribute to Russian filmmaker Larisa Shepitko, who died tragically in a car accident in 1979 at the age of 40. This documentary by her husband, Elem Klimov, includes excerpts from all of Shepitko's films, and her own voice is heard talking about her life and art.
